description: New Zealand customs audit checklist for DHL Express shipments

header.name: Header-Level Cross-Reference Checks
header.description: Document-level validations across entry print, commercial invoice, and air waybill

checks.description: Verify the correct importer of record based on incoterms. For DDP shipments, the supplier should be the importer of record. For all other incoterms (including DAP), the buyer/consignee should be the importer of record.
checks.checking_logic: First check the incoterms. If DDP, compare the owner name on EPR with supplier name on CI. For all other incoterms, compare owner name on EPR with buyer name on CI. Note: Fuzzy matching is acceptable for company names.
checks.pass_conditions: Owner on EPR matches the appropriate party (supplier for DDP, buyer for other incoterms) on CI.

checks.description: Supplier name consistency across documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare the supplier name on the entry print with the supplier name on the commercial invoice. Fuzzy matching is acceptable - do not consider abbreviations, minor spelling differences, corporate codes, etc.
checks.pass_conditions: Supplier on entry print is consistent with supplier name on commercial invoice.

checks.description: Incoterms consistency between entry print and commercial invoice
checks.checking_logic: Compare incoterms between entry print and commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Incoterms must be consistent, allowing for abbreviations.

checks.description: Currency consistency between entry print and commercial invoice
checks.checking_logic: Compare currency between entry print and commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Currency must be consistent, allowing for abbreviations.

checks.description: Invoice number exact match between documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare invoice number on entry print with invoice number on commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Invoice numbers must match exactly

checks.description: Shipper name consistency across documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare shipper name on air waybill with supplier name on commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Shipper on AWB must be consistent with supplier on commercial invoice, allowing for fuzzy matching

checks.description: Consignee/receiver name consistency across documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare consignee name on air waybill with buyer name on commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Consignee must be consistent across documents, allowing for fuzzy matching

checks.description: Country of origin validation across documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare country of origin on entry print with country of origin on commercial invoice
checks.pass_conditions: Country of origin must be consistent across all documents

checks.description: Country of export consistency
checks.checking_logic: Compare country of export on air waybill with country of export on entry print
checks.pass_conditions: Country of export must be consistent

checks.description: Origin and load port validation
checks.checking_logic: Compare origin port and departure airport from air waybill with entry print
checks.pass_conditions: Port information must be consistent across documents

checks.description: Weight of goods consistency across documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare weight on air waybill with weight on entry print
checks.pass_conditions: Weight must be consistent across all documents, allowing for minor rounding differences

checks.description: Number of packages consistency
checks.checking_logic: Compare number of packages across air waybill and entry print
checks.pass_conditions: Package count must be consistent across all documents

checks.description: Goods description consistency (not HS-linked description)
checks.checking_logic: Check if description on entry print matches description on invoice. Should describe actual goods, not generic HS code descriptions.
checks.pass_conditions: Description on entry print must match invoice description, allowing for reasonable variations

valuation.name: Valuation Elements Checklist
valuation.description: FOB, CIF, freight, insurance, and other valuation-related checks

checks.description: Value for Duty consistency between documents
checks.checking_logic: Compare VFD on entry print with invoice total, considering incoterm adjustments
checks.pass_conditions: VFD on entry print must correctly represent the dutiable value based on invoice and incoterm

checks.description: Free on board (FOB) value validation
checks.checking_logic: Compare FOB value on entry print with FOB amount on commercial invoice.
checks.pass_conditions: FOB value on entry print must match the FOB amount (or calculated FOB value) on commercial invoice. If the invoice does not provide a FOB amount, then default to PASS.

checks.description: Cost, Insurance, and Freight (CIF) value validation
checks.checking_logic: Compare CIF value on entry print with CIF amount on commercial invoice.
checks.pass_conditions: CIF value on entry print must match the CIF amount (or calculated CIF value) on commercial invoice. If the invoice does not provide a CIF amount, then default to PASS.

checks.description: Freight amount validation based on incoterm
checks.checking_logic: If freight inclusive incoterm and freight specified on invoice, check against entry print. If freight unknown, it is acceptable to declare as zero.
checks.pass_conditions: If freight amount specified, it must match between commercial invoice and entry print. If no freight specified, pass is acceptable.

checks.description: Insurance charges consistency
checks.checking_logic: If insurance-inclusive incoterm (CIF, CIP), verify insurance is declared. Compare insurance on entry with insurance on invoice if provided.
checks.pass_conditions: Insurance must be declared for insurance-inclusive incoterms. Insurance amount must match between entry and invoice if both are provided.

checks.description: Total of freight and insurance costs validation
checks.checking_logic: Compare transport and insurance costs on entry print with transport_and_insurance amount on commercial invoice.
checks.pass_conditions: Transport and insurance costs on entry print must match the transport_and_insurance amount (or calculated sum) on commercial invoice. If the invoice does not provide a transport_and_insurance amount, then default to PASS.

checks.description: Total invoice amount validation
checks.checking_logic: Compare the invoice total on the entry print with the invoice total amount on the commercial invoice.
checks.pass_conditions: Invoice total on entry print must match the invoice total amount on the commercial invoice.
